name: Gathering - Snowy Mountains
goal-condition: Time Over or Deliver the Paw Pass Ticket
quest-details: A nighttime gathering quest in the Snowy Mountains. GAther all the materials you can from the field, then deliver the Paw Pass Ticket to finish up. Be careful Large monsters lurk nearby!

name: Gathering - Jungle Zone
goal-condition: Time Over or Deliver the Paw Pass Ticket
quest-details: A nighttime gathering quest in the Jungle. Gather all the materials you can from the field, then deliver the Paw Pass Ticket to finish up. Be carefull Large Monster lurk nearby!

name: Gathering - Desert Zone
goal-condition: Time Over or Deliver the Paw Pass Ticket
quest-details: A nighttime gathering quest in the Desert. Gather all the materials you can from the field, then deliver the Paw Pass Ticket to finish up. Be carefull Large monster lurk nearby!

name: A True Foe - The Giadrome!
quest-details: Within a group of the ally carnivorous Giaprey, there is a leader. They call is the Giadrome. I need a hunter's strength to show that pack of beasts and their leader who's boss!

name: Reckless Bulldrome Hunter
quest-details: My son decided to become a hunter and ran off after a Bulldrome on his own! Of course, now the tables have turned and I'm worried! Hunt down the Bulldrome on the Snowy Mountains!

name: Flanked by Velocidrome
quest-details: All the children in the village have gatherd their allowances to pay you to get rid of two carnivores. Our parents couldn't do it, so it's up to you to defend our fields and animals!

name: Aim for the Jungle Crab
quest-details: I've always longed to go hunting in the Jungle! However, if a huge monster appeared, I'd be finished! Maybe you could take out the Daimyo Hermitaur for me?

name: The Poison Fanged Duo
quest-details: There appears to be two Gendrome among the pack of Genprey ravaging the Desert. This has caused the Genprey to become frenzied and attack humans. You must get rid of the leaders!

name: Pursuit of the Sand wyvern
quest-details: A giant sand wyvern has appeared in the Desrt along with a pack of Genprey. Forget about the Genprey, but take care of the Cephadrome so the merchants can return to work!

name: Ultimate Crab Dinner
quest-details: I am a true connoisseur of crab cuisine, and so such a connoisseur. I suspect the Daimyo Hermitaur found in the Desert are incredibly tasty! One is never enough, so hunt down two!

name: Trapped by Yian Kut-Ku
goal-condition: Hunt the Yian Kut-Ku and Blue Yian Kut-Ku
quest-details: The Yian Kut-Ku are circling, screaming in their shrill voices. Everyone is trapped inside the town! Please do something!

name: Conga Counterattack
quest-details: I asked some hunters to slay a Congalala for me; however, they met defeat at the hooves of a Bulldrome. I didn't think it would come to this, but I need your help!

name: The Beating of Royal Wings
quest-details: It's no use. No matter where I look, I can't seem to find the Vespoid Queen! Perhaps if you slayed a large number of vespoids to make her feel that her swam was in grave danger, she migh appear...

name: Lao-Shan Lung Draws Near!
goal-condition: Defend the Fortess from Ashen Lao-Shan Lung
quest-details: It seems that once again our land is in crisis. The giant elder dragon Lao-Shan Lung is approaching the village from the Mountains. Head to the fort and defend our way of life!

name: Gathering - Swamp Zone
goal-condition: Time Over or Deliver the Paw Pass Ticket
quest-details: A nighttime gathering quest in the Swamp. Gather all the matrials you can from the field, then deliver the Paw Pass Ticket to finish up. Be carefull Larger monsters lurk nearby

name: Gathering - Forest and Hills
goal-condition: Time Over or Deliver the Paw Pass Ticket
quest-details: A nighttime gathering quest in the Forest and Hills (Night). Gather all the matrials you can from the field, then deliver the Paw Pass Ticket to finish up. Be carfull Large monsters lurk nearby!

name: Gathering - Volcanic Zone
goal-condition: Time Over or Deliver the Paw Pass Ticket
quest-details: A nighttime gathering quest in the Volcanic Zone. Gather all the materials you can from the field, then deliver the Paw Pass Ticket to finish up. Be carefull Large monsters lurk nearby!

name: Two Roars in the Snow
quest-details: It happened in an instant... Two Blangongas destroyed all the trees around my house. Now all I want to do is hunt them down so I can get my revenge. Please help me!

name: King of the Mountians
quest-details: A Blangonga has staked its claim to a piece of the Snowy Mountains. Now we can't enter the area to gather firewood. Exterminate the Blangonga!

name: The Electrified Wyvern
quest-details: I wanted to test myself, so I went off in seatch of spotting a Bulldrome in the Snowy Mountains. But all of a sudden, a weird wyver appeared and it shocked me! I'm still smoking!

name: Red Shadow in the Swampland
quest-details: I've always longed to venture into the Swamp! I think I could hunt down a Kelbi, but I could never fight a wyvern. Maybe you'd take care of this special monster for me...

name: The Poison Gas
goal-condition: Hunt the Gypceros and Purple Gypceros
quest-details: *Cough* While I was practicing in the Jungle, I was attacked by two poison wyverns! You can see their thick poison gas before your very eyes... They are tough, please defeat them! *Cough*

name: Dual Plesioth
goal-condition: Hunt the Plesioth and Green Plesioth
quest-details: The water wyvern known as Plesioth is raging in the Jungle. And not just one of them! Head off immediately to slay them!

name: Attack of the Rathian
quest-details: My caravan was wiped out by the queen of the skies, the killder Rathian! I'll pay you whatever you ask if you hunt down that foul creature! Help me kind hunter, you're my only hope!

name: Water Wyvern in the Desert
quest-details: I found a giant water wyvern in a cave in the Desert! I cna't defeat it because it stays underwater. Slay it for me and the glory is all yours!

name: The Underwater Terror
quest-details: The lake underneath the Desert is connected to an underground river and patrolled by a green-scaled water wyvern... If you are truly a hunter, then it should pose no problem.

name: An Evening Soaked in Poison
quest-details: The Swamp's poison is mixing with the Iodrome's poison... It is a terrible scene! We need a professional hunter to assist us... Show us your skills!

name: Supreme Ruler of the Swamp
quest-details: Huntesr! It is time to hunt down the Shogun Cenataur. Let us rid the Swamp Zone of this menace and expand our strategic possibilities. This is a highly classified hunt. So don't tell a soul!

name: The Purple Poison Menace
quest-details: I saw a gigantic bird-like monster deep in the swamp! It scared everyone so bad that I can't do business with a thing like that out there! Please hunt it down so I can work in peace!

name: Eliminate the Rathalos!
quest-details: I request the assistance of only the bravest of hunters to find and hunt the Rathalos that has appeared near here. Of course, a handsome reward will be paid upon success.

name: The Shogun's Encampment
quest-details: Hey! Hey! Have you heard the news!? There's a rumor that two enormous monsters with thick shells have appeared in the Volcanic Belt! There must be a hunter somewhere who can face them!

name: Basarios: Unseen Peril
quest-details: A wyvern attacked my team from out of the blue while we were on an expedition to the Volcanic Belt. Where did it come from? Please slay it!

name: Envoy to Disaster
quest-details: The volcano has erupted with a deluge of black snake-like wyverns. They are the envoys to disaster. Hunt 20 of these REmobras down and appease the Mountain gods.

name: Lao-Shan Lung Draws Near!
goal-condition: Defend the Fortess from Ashen Lao-Shan Lung
quest-details: It seems that once again our land is in crisis. The giant elder dragon Lao-Shan Lung is approaching the village from the Mountains. Head to the fort and defend our way of life!

name: Meeting of the Blangongas
quest-details: It-it-it's awful!! A group of Blangongas are gathering on the mountain! With all those brutes in one spot. It means trouble for the village! Please help us!

name: The White Brute
quest-details: We cam to this land seeking the fabled Kirin, and at last we had found it! But the heavens opened and lightning struck, scattering our team. We need your help to save our co-workers!

name: Pricy Mushrooms, Shaka!
quest-details: Have you ever heard of *Select Mushrooms*? Collect just 3 of them and you'll be rich beyond belief! Although I have heard that the King Shakalaka keeps a tight watch over those things...

name: Twin Walls of the Jungle
goal-condition: Hunt all of the Large Monsters
quest-details: Oh, the atmosphere is abuzz, and the land tells me of the monsters' fury! Great Hunter, I call upon you to put a stop to the Blue Yian Kut-Ku and the Rathian that appears after it falls!

name: The Meeting of Sea and Air
goal-condition: Hunt all of the Large Monsters
quest-details: Oh me, oh my! A Daimyo Hermitaur and a Green Plesioth have both appeared in the same area. I'm in search of a hunter who'll rid me of them one by one. Won't anyone step forward?

name: Red Lightning, Violet Blade
goal-condition: Hunt all of the Large Monsters
quest-details: A Khezu and a Shogun Ceanataur have descended upon the swampland and are really going at it! If we don't put an end to them quick, we may end up with a lot of casualties! Heeeeelp!

name: Land of the Tremors
quest-details: A group of highly skilled hunters went off to slay two Tigrex, but they became the hunted. Please destroy the two Tigrex and open a clear route for our rescue team.

name: Land of the Tremors
quest-details: A group of highly skilled hunters went off to slay two Tigrex, but they became the hunted. Please destroy the two Tigrex and open a clear route for our rescue team.

name: The Rajang in the Snow
quest-details: I had never seen the fanged beast with two horns on its head before, and I never want to again with the way it was rampaging across the snow!

name: The Tigrex's Roar
quest-details: I have an urgent request from a hunter on a expedition in the Desert! It seems he has encountered the mighty Tigrex! Go to his aid and crush this beast at once!

name: Pink Dance in the Jungle
quest-details: I've always longed to be a hunter, but a meeting with a Rathian ended that! Now that I know what it takes, I'll start over, but you have the spirit to hunt down the Rathian!

name: The Runaway Diablos
quest-details: A giant wyvern smashed the border-wall and ran into this area. We need to find and kill it before it causes any more trouble!

name: Four Horns
goal-condition: Hunt the Diablos and Black Diablos
quest-details: I simply can't bear to think about the terror and pain those Diablos are causing my people. I can't sleep at niight with that worry! Hunt down those 2 Diablos for me!

name: Rajang of Mountain Flames
quest-details: I went up to the Snowy Mountains to view the aurora, but the truth is that I hate the cold! That's when it hit me! I should have a coat made from Rajang fur! Hunt one for me!

name: Terror of the Gravios
quest-details: A fearsome Gravios has appeared amidst the magma and desolation of the Volcanic Belt. Hunt down the fire breather for us!

name: Black Rock in the Swamp
quest-details: Even in the relative calm of the Swamp Zone, something has stirred up the monster, in particular, heavily armored wyverns have been attacking us. Can you help us out?

name: A Troublesome Pair
quest-details: A Rathalos and Rathian have paired up and are ravaging my country! I wanted to end their reign of terror, but my father will not allow it! Please! Defeat them for me!

name: Blue Sky, Pink Earth
goal-condition: Hunt the Azure Rathalos and Pink Rathian
quest-details: Did you see the two wyverns that appeared in the hills? An azure-shelled Rathalosand a pink-scaled Rathian... Hunting them down would surely make you a top hunter ! ...Try you luck?

name: Attack of the Rathalos
quest-details: It cannot be... We tried so hard to kill it... But... My entire war band was wiped out by a wyvern. Now it all rests upon your shoulders monster hunter! Slay it!

name: Deny the Silver Rathalos
quest-details: I have a request to all excellent hunters. I would like you to hunt down the silver wyvern that lives in the forgotten tower. OK... You don't even have to be excellent.

name: Find the Gold Phantom
quest-details: All of my rations were gone and I was fading out of consciousness when out of the corner of my eye I saw ancient ruins and a golden wyvern up above. Was it all a dream? Find the truth!

name: The Fleeting Shadow
quest-details: I saw them! I really did! The ground was bathed in sparks as two phantom beasts bathed in a lava pool! It was not a dream! You've gotta believe me! Go see for yourself!

name: The Frozen Dictator
quest-details: I saw it! I saw it! In the middle of a blinding snow storm, there it was; dark black wings were dancing in the sky... No mere human could stand up to it! Don't even think of hunting it!

name: The Elder Dragon of Mist
quest-details: Our intuition told us to turn around, but we thought no one was there... Yet even though no one should've been there, we were attacked from behind! Beware! It was an enemy never before seen!

name: Toward the Silence
quest-details: It seems an unknown elder dragon has appeared in the swamp zone. However, no one truly got a clear look at it. What could the beast have been? Slay it, but proceed with caution!

name: The War of Immolation
quest-details: This is truly an emergency! A red fire-breathing dragon is approaching this very town! This is no time to dilly-dally! We need the help of every skilled hunter in this land!

name: Emperor of Flame
quest-details: I have an earnest request of you... As the last of my responsibilities, I request your help. I want you to fight the elder fire dragon we cornered in the Volcanic Belt, but beware its flames!

name: Legendary Black Dragon
quest-details: The legendary black dragon... It really exists then? We've prepared all instruments of war to assist you in your quest to destroy the dragon. The fate of the nation lies in your hands.

name: The End Times
quest-details: It appears the time has finally come. The bloodstained scales of the red dragon have graced the earth agin in flaming glory. If you can stop this beast...

name: Ancestral Dragon
quest-details: Hee hee hee... The time has come. Here is your invitation to the ball. Wear your Sunday best and bring your greatest weapon, for it is time to go to the dance with the king of disaster.

name: Wyvern of the Wind
quest-details: The Nargacuga of the Great Forest... It's so fast, I could barely see it. But please, if there is one request that needs to be fulfilled, it's this one!

name: Born of Darkness
quest-details: All of my friends... gone. I saw a tail swish through the air, and 2 red lights. That's all. That thing's not a monster; it's a demon! Someone exorcise it, please!

name: Two Queens
goal-condition: Hunt the Rathian and the Pink Rathian
quest-details: Think you can handle two Rathian at the same time!? Then come on down to the Arena, the only place to test you might! We eagerly await you arrival, Hunter!

name: One-Horned Demon King
quest-details: Ah, I tried to slay it, but I way in way over my head. Still, I can't let it go, so I ask that if you have the courage to face this beast, to please step forward.

name: Phantasmic Battle
quest-details: I've received an urgen communique from my colleague who went to investigate deep inside the volcano, Please hurry, but be careful. The monster is a bit... unique.

name: Furious Beauties
goal-condition: Hunt all of the Large Monsters
quest-details: Wh-What's going on...? All of a sudden, a ton of monsters just showed up in the Snowy Mountains! Any hunter willing to lend a hand, please come help us on the hunt!

name: Figt for the Throne
goal-condition: Hunt all of the Large Monsters
quest-details: Help! There are some dangerous monsters lurking in the Forest and HIlls, making it impossible for me to enter the area. But if I don't gather what I need, my mother's illness will...

name: Hotter than Hell itself
goal-condition: Hunt all of the Large Monsters
quest-details: We've received word that a Basarios and a Gravios are going wild inside due to volcanic activity. This is a very dire situation, and we require the immediate dispatch of a hunter.

name: Desert Unifier
goal-condition: Hunt all of the Large Monsters
quest-details: My sister and I are in an argument over which is the most beautiful: Daimyo shells, Cephadrome scales, or Diablos horns. Seeing is believing, so I demand you bring all three to me!

name: The Approaching Gaoren
goal-condition: Defend the Town from Shen Gaoren
quest-details: Our town is embroiled in an unprecedented conflict. A fortess-like shelled monster is threatening our safety. We need help immediately!

name: Rise to the Summit
quest-details: The combined strength of the Hunter's Guild has successfully cornered an Akantor in the Volcanic Belt. Now all that is left is to slay the beast, a task for only the most valiant.
